I would skip this one, there are no subtitles for the non-english parts, secretmyth has never let me down until now.

There should be hard coded english subs, for those that have the movie go directly to the 1 hour 5 minute mark where she and the guy are talking in Russian....no subs.

One of the worst torrents from secret myth that I can recall.  First off, no hard coded subs for the non-english speaking parts....and not even a separate srt file for them as well.  If you didn't want to hard code them....ok, but include the srt file then.

2nd, this doesn't concern me since I play back my movies through my Popcorn Hour A-110 but people will PS3's can't play this movie back because of cinavia DRM.

At least warn people that play back their movies through PS3's that this movie will not work on them.

The quality is fine, but 2 thumbs down for this release.

My audio playback also is badly out of synch and at times garbled.

Sometimes in theaters you also can't make out dialog.  That's due to a film's poor  sound editing, more often than not, not the playback equipment.  I don't know if that's the problem here.  I'll find out after I play a different dl.

Evidently, most aren't having trouble with the audio, or there'd be more complaints, but, there are enough complaints to warrant skipping this one.

Does anyone know a way to fix the audio synch?
